mapper.select: SELECT pno, commentcount, title, nickname, views, likes, date_SUB(bdatetime,INTERVAL 9 HOUR) as bdatetime FROM board WHERE bno=3 order by bdatetime DESC limit 5;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reportBoard(pno, title, rtype, rcontent, rdatetime, nickname, rcheck) VALUES (#{pno}, #{title}, #{rtype}, #{rcontent}, now(), #{nickname}, '처리대기중')
